MTROperationalCertificateIssuer  issueOperationalCertificate(forRequest:attestationInfo:controller:completion:) Instance MethodissueOperationalCertificate(forRequest:attestationInfo:controller:completion:)iOS 16.4+iPadOS 16.4+Mac Catalyst 16.4+macOS 13.3+tvOS 16.4+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 9.4+func issueOperationalCertificate(
    forRequest csrInfo: MTROperationalCSRInfo,
    attestationInfo: MTRDeviceAttestationInfo,
    controller: MTRDeviceController,
    completion: @escaping (MTROperationalCertificateChain?, (any Error)?) -> Void
)func issueOperationalCertificate(
    forRequest csrInfo: MTROperationalCSRInfo,
    attestationInfo: MTRDeviceAttestationInfo,
    controller: MTRDeviceController
) async throws -> MTROperationalCertificateChainRequired
